name: Mystifying Song
real_text:
Marie Lambeau deck only.
Fast. Play when the agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold.
Until the end of the phase, the agenda cannot advance by reaching its doom threshold. Remove Mystifying Song from the game.

Marie Lambeau deck only.

name: Baron Samedi
real_text: Revelation - Put Baron Samedi into play. He cannot leave play while he has less than 3 doom on him. Forced - When any amount of damage is placed on an investigator in Baron Samedi's location: Place 1 additional damage on that investigator. [free] Exhaust Baron Samedi: Place 1 doom on Baron Samedi. If he has 3 or more doom on him, discard him.
